experience.blurb: Lululemon Studio, formerly Mirror, is a digital fitness company, running a subscription model on a digital mirror.

points.title: API Integration & Development
points.point: Collaborated and built a robust API integrating the admin site, e-commerce platform, and mobile applications with the Mirror, resulting in system efficiency.

points.title: Docker Optimization
points.point: Optimized Docker containers and workflows while improving application performance and reliability.

points.title: Leadership in Cross-Functional Team
points.point: Led a cross-functional team to revamp the music integration feature on the Mirror, enhancing the user experience and an increase in user interaction.

experience.blurb: Zipari builds a suite of tools designed to help organize and streamline health insurance, from purchasing to support.

points.title: API Development and Maintenance for Insurance Sales
points.point: Led the development and ongoing maintenance of a sophisticated API platform designed for selling insurance policies, significantly enhancing transaction capabilities and client interaction efficiency.

points.title: Customizable Feature Design
points.point: Spearheaded the design of versatile, extendable features within the core product, enabling tailored solutions to meet diverse client needs and increasing client satisfaction.

points.title: Client API Integration
points.point: Orchestrated the integration with external client APIs, enabling seamless data exchange and enhancing system interoperability. This initiative improved data retrieval and transmission efficiency by 40%, thereby boosting overall system performance and client satisfaction metrics.

experience.blurb: Komodo Health is working to build the most complete healthcare map in the US, using various data sources and standardizing them for easier searching and data analysis.

points.title: Data Search Tool Transformation
points.point: Played a pivotal role in a dynamic team that transformed an internal data search tool into a marketable external product, showcasing innovation and adaptability.

points.title: Feature Specification and Code Structuring
points.point: Collaborated closely with the Product Manager and Team Lead in writing detailed specifications for new features and structured code.

points.title: Coding Best Practices and Team Collaboration
points.point: Recommended and implemented best coding practices to guide two formerly solo engineers into a structured team, improving productivity.

experience.blurb: Clover Health is a Medicare insurance company that utilizes member data to help predict health futures to improve outcomes.

points.title: Remote System Messaging and Processing
points.point: Engineered a comprehensive system for receiving and processing messages from an external API, incorporating advanced error checking and monitoring features.

points.title: Microservice Development for Member Tracking at Clover
points.point: Led the development of a microservice designed to meticulously track the status of all members across various programs at Clover.

points.title: Server and Database Configuration for Program Microservice
points.point: Orchestrated the creation and configuration of servers and databases essential for the program microservice, including the development of a bespoke bash script for streamlined code deployment.

points.title: Establishment of Code Standards
points.point: Instituted rigorous code standards using Black and isort, standardizing coding practices across the team.

experience.blurb: Marvel is a leading character-based entertainment company, developing comics, books, movies, games, and other media.

points.title: Server Standards Update and Proxy Implementation
points.point: Collaborated with the DevOps team to update server standards, leading the development of a Squid proxy to elevate TLS1.0 requests to TLS1.2.

points.title: OAuth System Maintenance
points.point: Oversaw the maintenance and optimization of an OAuth authentication system, enabling secure third-party system integrations.

points.title: Consultation on Marvel Site Redesign
points.point: Provided expert advice on API design, Lumen framework, and security protocols to the team working on the Marvel site redesign.

experience.blurb: Forbes Media is a print and digital publishing company with international readers and writers.

points.title: Leadership in CMS Development at Forbes
points.point: Served as the lead developer for Forbes' WordPress CMS and Falcon CMS, steering the development and optimization of these critical content management systems.

points.title: PHP Coding Standards and Automation
points.point: Established and enforced PHP coding standards, led code review processes, and implemented SASS/Grunt automation to enhance development workflows.

points.title: Architecture Development for New CMS
points.point: Played a key role in architecting a new, in-house CMS, focusing on scalability and user experience.

points.title: Leadership and Cross-Departmental Collaboration
points.point: Actively participated in interviewing candidates and facilitated communication with other department heads.

additional_experience.title: Gamers' Plane
additional_experience.blurb: Gamers’ Plane is a website that runs on a PHP API drawing from a MySQL and MongoDB database, feeding an AngularJS frontend. It’s currently being refactored to use FastAPI and NextJS frontend, adding a Redis cache, powered by Docker. It is a solo project, in which I do development, design, marketing, etc, and averages about 500 users a day.
